text.Words: Andruss: Toast! You good out there?
Andruss: Good! I was worried something had happened!
Toasterman: While I am fine I believe we have found a new species on this planet.
Andruss: I thought we had detected {all} the species on this planet?.
Toasterman: No, there's been a new species roaming about. It's a white amorphous goo that is able to levitate.
Andruss: It sounds like the eyes in the inhabitants of that planet there, maybe one was finally killed.
Toasterman: If that's the case then we may have a slight problem on our hands. That goo cannot have been contained for nothing.
Andruss: That's a worry now, we should probably tell the boss this.
Toasterman: Yes. {I'm sure I will get the blame for this..}
Andruss: Look toasty, I can vouch for ya. I know it wasn't you that killed that one void being. The question is what did though.
Toasterman: Sorry to say but we have more important matters at hand than why. This thing is aggresive and truly out for bolt and blood.
Andruss: That is true, I just hope it's not able to hop between planets!
Toasterman: Since it can levitate who knows what limits it has.
Andruss: {That is indeed a concern}. I'll see you back at base with the boss, ok?
Toasterman: Aye, let's get going and assess the threat better.
Toasterman: Yea. See ya in a while.
